product_overview: Half Trip é uma plataforma PWA para planejar viagens em grupo, compartilhar roteiros e dividir despesas de forma justa. Oferece criação de viagens, roteiro diário, controle de despesas, convites e exportação de relatórios, com suporte offline e sincronização.
core_goals: Permitir planejamento colaborativo de viagens (itinerário, notas, checklists)
Registrar e dividir despesas entre participantes com sugestões de acerto
Oferecer modo offline PWA com sincronização quando online
Facilitar convites por e-mail ou link e gestão de participantes
Fornecer exportação de dados (PDF/CSV) e controles de privacidade/conta

features.name: User Login
features.description: Entrar na conta usando email e senha via Supabase Auth.
user_flows: Navigate to /login -> Fill email input field -> Fill password input field -> Click "Entrar" button to submit -> Redirect to /trips
Navigate to /login -> Fill email input field with incorrect password -> Click "Entrar" button to submit -> See error message on invalid credentials -> Stay on /login

features.name: User Registration
features.description: Criar nova conta preenchendo nome, email e senha.
user_flows: Navigate to /register -> Fill name input field -> Fill email input field -> Fill password input field -> Fill confirm password input field -> Click "Criar conta" button to submit -> See success message to check email

Navigate to /register -> Fill name input field -> Fill email input field -> Fill password input field -> Fill confirm password input field with mismatched value -> Click "Criar conta" button to submit -> See validation error about password confirmation -> Stay on /register

features.name: Password Recovery
features.description: Solicitar link de redefinição e definir nova senha a partir do e-mail.
user_flows: Navigate to /forgot-password -> Fill email input field -> Click submit button -> Check email for reset link -> Click reset link -> Navigate to /reset-password -> Fill new password on reset page -> Click submit to save new password -> Redirect to /login
Navigate to /forgot-password -> Fill unregistered email input field -> Click submit button -> See error or failure message about email -> Stay on /forgot-password

features.name: Trip Management
features.description: Criar, editar e deletar viagens com assistente de 3 etapas e ver lista de viagens.
user_flows: Navigate to /trips -> Click "Nova viagem" button to open create dialog -> Fill trip name, destination, description (step 1) -> Click Next -> Select start and end dates, trip style (step 2) -> Click Next -> Choose base currency and transport type (step 3) -> Click submit to create trip -> See new trip card in /trips -> Click trip card to open /trip/{id}
Navigate to /trips -> Click "Nova viagem" button to open create dialog -> Leave required fields empty -> Click submit to create trip -> See validation error messages -> Trip not created

features.name: Itinerary Activities
features.description: Planejar atividades diárias com horário, local e categoria; editar, deletar e reordenar.
user_flows: Navigate to /trip/{id}/itinerary -> Click "Adicionar atividade" to add activity -> Fill title -> Fill date -> Fill start time -> Fill duration -> Select location with autocomplete -> Choose category -> Click submit to save -> See activity in itinerary timeline

Navigate to /trip/{id}/itinerary -> Click "Adicionar atividade" to add activity -> Fill title -> Fill date in past or invalid format -> Click submit to save -> See validation error about date/time -> Activity not added

features.name: Expense Tracking
features.description: Registrar despesas, escolher quem pagou e dividir valores entre participantes.
user_flows: Navigate to /trip/{id}/expenses -> Click "Adicionar despesa" to add expense -> Fill description -> Fill amount -> Select currency -> Fill date -> Select category -> Select who paid -> Choose split type (equal, by amount, by percentage) -> Select participants and adjust splits -> Click submit to save expense -> See expense card in list

Navigate to /trip/{id}/expenses -> Click "Adicionar despesa" to add expense -> Fill description -> Fill non-numeric amount -> Click submit to save expense -> See validation error about amount -> Expense not saved

features.name: Balance and Settlements
features.description: Visualizar saldos dos participantes, sugestões de acerto e marcar pagamentos (incl. PIX QR).
user_flows: Navigate to /trip/{id}/balance -> View participant balances -> View suggested settlements -> Click to generate PIX QR code -> See PIX QR dialog -> Click to mark settlement as paid -> See updated balances and settlement history
Navigate to /trip/{id}/balance -> Click to mark settlement as paid -> Receive backend error -> See error toast or message -> Settlement not recorded and balances unchanged

features.name: Budget Tracking
features.description: Definir orçamentos por categoria e acompanhar progresso de gastos.
user_flows: Navigate to /trip/{id}/budget -> Click "Adicionar orcamento" to add budget -> Select category -> Set amount -> Click submit to save -> See progress bars updated (spent vs budgeted)
Navigate to /trip/{id}/budget -> Click "Adicionar orcamento" to add budget -> Set negative or invalid amount -> Click submit to save -> See validation error -> Budget not saved

features.name: Checklists
features.description: Criar listas de embalagem e checklists colaborativos com itens marcáveis.
user_flows: Navigate to /trip/{id}/checklists -> Click "Nova checklist" to create -> Enter checklist name -> Add items to checklist -> Click checkbox to toggle item -> See item state saved
Navigate to /trip/{id}/checklists -> Click "Nova checklist" to create -> Leave checklist name empty -> Click submit -> See validation error -> Checklist not created

features.name: Trip Notes
features.description: Adicionar notas compartilhadas, editar, fixar e deletar notas do grupo.
user_flows: Navigate to /trip/{id}/notes -> Click "Nova nota" to add note -> Enter title and content -> Click submit to save -> See note in list -> Click pin to pin note to top
Navigate to /trip/{id}/notes -> Click "Nova nota" to add note -> Enter title but leave content empty (if content required) -> Click submit -> See validation error -> Note not saved

features.name: Participants and Invites
features.description: Gerenciar membros da viagem, convidar por email ou gerar link compartilhável e aceitar convites.
user_flows: Navigate to /trip/{id}/participants -> View member list -> Click to invite by email -> Fill email address -> Click send invite -> See success confirmation -> Click to create shareable invite link -> Click copy invite link -> Navigate to /invite/{code} -> Click accept invite -> Redirect to /trip/{id}

Navigate to /trip/{id}/participants -> Click to invite by email -> Fill invalid email format -> Click send invite -> See validation error -> Invite not sent -> Alternatively navigate to /invite/{code} with expired code -> See error message about invalid or expired invite

features.name: Trip Dashboard
features.description: Hub central com estatísticas da viagem, feed de atividade e enquetes rápidas.
user_flows: Navigate to /trip/{id} -> View trip stats (total spent, budget, members, activities) -> View activity log feed -> Click create poll -> Fill question and options -> Click submit -> See poll in dashboard -> Vote on existing polls -> See vote counted
Navigate to /trip/{id} -> Click create poll -> Fill question but leave options empty -> Click submit -> See validation error -> Poll not created

features.name: Settings and Profile
features.description: Gerenciar perfil do usuário, trocar senha, preferências de email e ações de risco.
user_flows: Navigate to /settings -> Upload avatar photo -> Edit name and email -> Click save -> Change password by filling old password, new password and confirm -> Click save -> Toggle email notification preferences -> See updated preferences
Navigate to /settings -> Change password with incorrect old password -> Click save -> See error message about incorrect current password -> Password unchanged

features.name: Export Reports
features.description: Exportar dados da viagem em PDF ou CSV para relatórios e compartilhamento.
user_flows: Navigate to /trip/{id} -> Click "Exportar PDF" button -> Download generated PDF with trip summary
Navigate to /trip/{id} -> Click "Exportar PDF" button while offline -> See error or queued/export-failed message -> No immediate download

routes.description: Landing page with hero, features, and CTA
Login form with email and password
Set new password via email link
List all user trips with create trip button
User profile, password change, email preferences, danger zone
Trip dashboard with stats, activity log, polls
Expense list with add, edit, delete
Budget tracking by category with progress bars
Member list, invite by email or link
Packing lists and checklists with items

features.name: User Login
features.description: Login with email and password credentials via Supabase Auth
user_interactions: See error message on invalid credentials

features.name: User Registration
features.description: Register new account with name, email, password
user_interactions: See success message to check email

features.name: Password Recovery
features.description: Request password reset email
user_interactions: Fill new password on reset page
Click submit to save new password

features.name: Trip Management
features.description: Create, edit, and delete trips with 3-step wizard
user_interactions: Click "Nova viagem" button to open create dialog
Select start and end dates, trip style (step 2)
Choose base currency and transport type (step 3)
Click trip card to open trip dashboard
Click edit menu to modify trip details
Click delete menu to remove trip

features.name: Itinerary Activities
features.description: Plan daily activities with time, location, and category
user_interactions: Fill title, date, start time, duration

features.name: Expense Tracking
features.description: Record expenses with splits among trip members
user_interactions: Fill description, amount, currency, date, category
Choose split type (equal, by amount, by percentage)

features.name: Balance and Settlements
features.description: View balances, settlement suggestions, and PIX QR codes
user_interactions: Click to mark settlement as paid
Generate PIX QR code for payment

features.name: Budget Tracking
features.description: Set category budgets and track spending progress

features.name: Checklists
features.description: Create packing lists and checklists with items

features.name: Trip Notes
features.description: Shared notes for trip planning
user_interactions: Click pin to pin note to top

features.name: Participants and Invites
features.description: Invite members via email or link, manage participants
user_interactions: Click to create shareable invite link

features.name: Trip Dashboard
features.description: Central hub with stats, activity feed, polls
user_interactions: View trip stats (total spent, budget, members, activities)
Create poll with question and options
Quick navigate to itinerary, expenses, balance

features.name: Settings and Profile
features.description: User profile, password change, email preferences, danger zone

features.name: Export Reports
features.description: Export trip data as PDF or CSV
user_interactions: Download generated PDF with trip summary

known_limitations.issue: AI Receipt Analysis is simulated - photo capture works but extraction is not implemented
known_limitations.impact: Users cannot auto-extract amount/description from receipts

known_limitations.issue: Flight search dialog exists but flight API is not connected
Real-time presence infrastructure exists but is not fully implemented
known_limitations.impact: Users cannot see who else is viewing the same page

known_limitations.issue: Push notifications PWA support exists but backend does not send them
App uses Portuguese (pt-BR) throughout - all buttons, labels, and messages are in Portuguese
known_limitations.impact: Tests must use Portuguese text for assertions and interactions
